JavaScript Basics and much longer text.question: Which of these is NOT a JavaScript data type?
JavaScript Basics and much longer text.explanation: JavaScript has Number type, not Integer specifically.

JavaScript Basics and much longer text.question: How do you write a comment in JavaScript?
JavaScript Basics and much longer text.explanation: // is used for single-line comments in JavaScript.

HTML Fundamentals and even longer text t.question: What does HTML stand for?
HTML Fundamentals and even longer text t.explanation: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language.

HTML Fundamentals and even longer text t.question: Which HTML tag is used for the largest heading?
HTML Fundamentals and even longer text t.explanation: <h1> creates the largest heading in HTML.

HTML Fundamentals and even longer text t.question: What is the correct HTML element for inserting a line break?
HTML Fundamentals and even longer text t.explanation: is the correct HTML element for line breaks.

CSS Styling.question: What does CSS stand for?
CSS Styling.explanation: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.

CSS Styling.question: Which property is used to change the background color?
CSS Styling.explanation: background-color is the correct CSS property.

CSS Styling.question: How do you select an element with id 'header'?
CSS Styling.explanation: # is used to select elements by ID in CSS.

Python Basics.question: What does 'precision' measure in information retrieval?
options: The percentage of all documents retrieved
The percentage of relevant documents retrieved out of all relevant documents in the collection
The percentage of relevant documents among the retrieved documents
The total number of queries processed
Python Basics.explanation: Precision is the percentage of relevant documents among the retrieved documents.

Python Basics.question: How do you create a comment in Python?
Python Basics.explanation: # is used for comments in Python.

Python Basics.question: What is the correct way to create a list in Python?
Python Basics.explanation: Square brackets [] are used to create lists in Python.

Database Concepts.question: What does SQL stand for?
Database Concepts.explanation: SQL stands for Structured Query Language.

Database Concepts.question: Which SQL command is used to retrieve data?
Database Concepts.explanation: SELECT is used to retrieve data from a database.

Database Concepts.question: What is a primary key?
Database Concepts.explanation: A primary key uniquely identifies each record in a table.

Web Development.question: What is the purpose of the <head> tag in HTML?
Web Development.explanation: The <head> tag contains metadata about the HTML document.

Web Development.question: Which HTTP method is used to send data to a server?
Web Development.explanation: POST is commonly used to send data to a server.

Web Development.question: What is responsive design?
options: Websites that adapt to screen sizes
Web Development.explanation: Responsive design means websites adapt to different screen sizes.

Git & Version Control.question: What is Git?
Git & Version Control.explanation: Git is a distributed version control system.

Git & Version Control.question: Which command creates a new Git repository?
Git & Version Control.explanation: 'git init' initializes a new Git repository.

Git & Version Control.question: What does 'git commit' do?
Git & Version Control.explanation: 'git commit' saves changes permanently to the repository.

Algorithms.question: What is Big O notation used for?
Algorithms.explanation: Big O notation describes algorithm time/space complexity.

Algorithms.question: Which sorting algorithm has O(n²) worst-case complexity?
Algorithms.explanation: Bubble Sort has O(n²) worst-case time complexity.

Algorithms.question: What is recursion?
Algorithms.explanation: Recursion is when a function calls itself.

Software Design.question: What is the DRY principle?
Software Design.explanation: DRY means Don't Repeat Yourself - avoid code duplication.

Software Design.question: Which design pattern ensures only one instance exists?
Software Design.explanation: Singleton pattern ensures only one instance of a class exists.

Computer Networks.question: What does HTTP stand for?
Computer Networks.explanation: HTTP stands for Hyper Text Transfer Protocol.

Computer Networks.question: Which port does HTTPS typically use?
What is an IP address?
Computer Networks.explanation: IP address stands for Internet Protocol address.
